title: VIT-AP Official Website
text: Official website of VIT-AP University with information on academics, admissions, news, and updates.

title: VTOP (VIT Online Portal)
text: VTOP is the official student portal for academics, course registration, attendance, leave, exams, fee payment, and more.

title: CDC Portal
text:
Career Development Center portal for placement registration, company updates, and career guidance. 
(Note: CDC portal is accessible only to final year students.)

title: VIT-AP Freshers Portal
text: Contact the VIT-AP Freshers Portal for assistance with onboarding, orientation, and other support services for new students.

title: Academic Research Portal
text: Access the Academic Research Portal for research resources, publications, and collaboration opportunities.

title: VIT-AP Events
text: Stay updated with the latest events, workshops, and seminars happening at VIT-AP through the official events page.

title: VIT-AP Schools and Departments
text: Access information about the various schools and departments at VIT-AP, including faculty details, courses offered, and research initiatives.

title: VIT-AP Campus Life
text: Explore the VIT-AP Campus Life portal for information on student activities, clubs, and campus facilities.

title: Clubs and Chapters
text: Access information about the various clubs and chapters at VIT-AP, including their activities, events, and membership details.

title: VIT-AP Guest House Booking
text: Access the VIT-AP Guest House Booking portal for accommodation details, booking procedures, and related information.

title: VIT-AP faculty ranker
text: Access the VIT-AP faculty ranker for information on faculty profiles, research interests, and academic contributions.

title: VIT-AP Youtube Channel
text: Access the VIT-AP Youtube Channel for video lectures, tutorials, and campus events.

title: VIT-AP Instagram
text: Follow VIT-AP on Instagram for the latest updates, events, and campus life highlights.

title: VIT-AP LinkedIn
text: Follow VIT-AP on LinkedIn for professional updates, networking opportunities, and industry news.

title: Vitopia: Sports and Cultural Event Website
text: Follow Vitopia for the latest updates on sports and cultural events at VIT-AP.

title: VTAPP Technical Event Website
text: Follow VTAPP for the latest updates on technical events and workshops at VIT-AP.

title: VIT-AP Faculty Information
text: Access information about VIT-AP faculty members, including their profiles, research interests, and publications.
